definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: The vegetable farmers space out the Chinese cabbage about 30cm apart.
sentences.chinese: 菜农每隔约30公分种一颗大白菜。

sentences.english: I remember it only had winter cabbages, right?
sentences.chinese: 我记得只有冬储大白菜，对吧？

sentences.english: These were then combined with cabbage and some kind of hot sauce.
sentences.chinese: 过一会儿加了些大白菜和什么热酱进去。

sentences.english: And for one kilogram of Chinese leaves, half would be discarded before packaging.
sentences.chinese: 一千克的大白菜，在包装之前，一半会被丢弃。

sentences.english: Green leafy vegetables, like broccoli and Chinese cabbage, are also calcium-rich.
sentences.chinese: 绿叶蔬菜，如花椰菜和大白菜，也都富含钙质。

sentences.english: Today, Chinese cabbage is no longer the main dish for northern people in winter.
sentences.chinese: 如今，大白菜不再是北方人冬天的当家菜。

sentences.english: They have been serving the Chinese cabbage and white gorse for three days.
sentences.chinese: 这三天他们一直供应大白菜和白荆豆。

sentences.english: The number of branch was main factor in yield components.
sentences.chinese: 大白菜种籽产量构成因素中单株分枝数是主要因素。

sentences.english: I intend to store these surplus Chinese cabbages for winter.
sentences.chinese: 剩余的大白菜冬藏起来。

sentences.english: There are dozens of cabbages stored in winter.
People in Germany eat their cabbage in sauerkraut form.
sentences.chinese: 而德国人就喜欢吃酸制的大白菜。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
